thread.title: The Comfort Master Travel Pillow Reaches The 1000 Customer Review Milestone In Amazon
thread.title_full: The Comfort Master Travel Pillow Reaches The 1000 Customer Review Milestone In Amazon

author: prbuzz.com
title: The Comfort Master Travel Pillow Reaches The 1000 Customer Review Milestone In Amazon
text:
July 1, 2015 - Wilmington, Delaware -- Crafty World is very proud to announce that the Comfort Master Travel Pillow has finally reached its 1000 review milestone in Amazon.com. The travel pillow was released almost 3 years ago in the online store.
"After almost 3 years, our Comfort Master Travel Pillow finally reached its 1000 customer review milestone and we couldn't be any happier." Jade Cryson, the media spokesperson for Crafty World, said in a statement. "The Comfort Master Travel Pillow is one of the first products we ever released in Amazon so it really means a lot to us to have achieved this milestone."
"We want to thank everyone who continued to support us with all our endeavors. We want to thank those who have sent in their feedback and comments. Everyone's input made it possible for us to improve our product." added Cryson.
At the time of writing, the Comfort Master Travel Pillow is available in a grey and purple color. Although, the blue pillows are currently out of stock more will be arriving soon in Amazon according to the Crafty World team.
The neck pillow is created using the highest quality thermo sensitive memory foam that the team can source. The pillow possesses therapeutic properties that can help prevent or alleviate neck, shoulder or upper back pain. The travel pillow can be used by kids and adults. It can be used for traveling and relaxing at home.
It comes with an elastic strap that can be attached to the luggage or the car's head rest. The Comfort Master pillow also comes with a soft removable washable cover for easy clean-up. It is currently available exclusively in Amazon.com with a 5 year money back guarantee.
About Crafty World
Crafty World is a family owned business aimed at providing excellent quality and affordably priced travel, craft supplies. They specialize in travel pillows plus many other travel accessories.
